laboratory_examinations.findings: QT interval (QTc) of 712 ms with intermittent 2:1 atrioventricular (AV) block.
Negative results for 9 established LQTS-susceptibility genes; identified L179F (C535T) missense mutation in SCN4B.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: No further mutations found in 262 genotype-negative LQTS patients.
